name: Jumpland Underground (LD29 version)
description:
This is my first Ludum Dare game, entering the jam of LD29. The theme was "Beneath the Surface." You can view my Ludum Dare entry page here

Help the guest travel through Jumpland by triggering their jump boots and manipulating obstacles.

Controls

MOVE - Left and Right arrows or A and D

JUMP - Spacebar

PRESS BUTTON - hold Up arrow or W

Restart - R

Pause - P

CHANGE CAMERA (PERSPECTIVE/ORTHOGRAPHIC) - C (note: game is playable in orthographic mode, but many visual elements, especially background mountains, were designed for perspective mode)
